title: Typophiles for Peace
content: Three years later, the [Typophiles for Peace](http://web.archive.org/web/20131102130743/http:/typophile.com/peace/) quilt is just as relevant as ever.
author: Jared Benson

comments.content:
Jared,  
Is there a desired format, size, file type?

ChrisL
100 x 100 GIF or JPG, preferably under 12k. No animations
how about 'Bush wild fire; DIE' I always knew they should have built a wall on the Mason Dixon line. I try never to go south of Philly

For the record, the proper place would be under the quilt itself at typophile.com/peace, but I can move these over.

Note that the comments field won't show up on /peace unless you're logged in.

I am surprised to see so few takers on this issue.
